title: Admin console
info: This admin console uses Mysql, React, HTML,CSS, Node.js, Express and JWT and is based off an admin panel I made in PHP several years ago to log in use. user: jasondansien@gmail.com pass:Passwd123

title: TasteIT
info: This is a recipe app where you can review and add recipes. it uses an api to get the country list and flags.

title: Speed Game
info: This is a simple speed game. you just click the cow when it appears, as time goes on it gets faster.

title: Pokedex
info: This is an app to show the use of an api to build a list of all the pokemon in the pokedex
